content.raw: Would be nice if you could restore the lost functionality. I don't think it will cause problems. Almost surprised it's lost....suspect it's a trivial change (possibly just because you return before accepting the event? Not sure, it doesn't look like you handle the parent class `mouseMoveEvent` much different than I did)
